20110118150555.000|20110118150557.000|CC1|A VERY SGRDISCRETE PATH THE BUL 
20110118150557.000|20110118150558.000|CC1|CAN TAKE.

20110118150602.000|20110118150604.000|CC1|IN, SAY, A CAR ACCIDENT.        
20110118150604.000|20110118150606.000|CC1|>> WE'VE HEARD, TOO, SHE COULD  
20110118150606.000|20110118150609.000|CC1|BE OUT AND MOVED TO A           
20110118150609.000|20110118150609.000|CC1|REHABILITATION FACILITY IN A    
20110118150609.000|20110118150610.000|CC1|MATTER OF DAYS.                 
20110118150610.000|20110118150612.000|CC1|WHAT ARE THE STEPS THAT NEED TO 
20110118150612.000|20110118150613.000|CC1|HELP FOR US TO SEE THAT AND WHAT
20110118150613.000|20110118150615.000|CC1|HAPPENS WHEN SHE GETS TO THAT   
20110118150615.000|20110118150616.000|CC1|REHAB FACILITY?                 
20110118150616.000|20110118150618.000|CC1|>> YOU WANT TO MAKE SURE THEY   
20110118150618.000|20110118150619.000|CC1|ARE STABLE.                     
20110118150619.000|20110118150620.000|CC1|SHE HAS TO HAVE HER FEEDING TUBE
20110118150620.000|20110118150621.000|CC1|IN PLACE AND MAKE SURE THE BRAIN
20110118150621.000|20110118150623.000|CC1|SWELLING IS NOT OVERWHELMING AND
20110118150623.000|20110118150627.000|CC1|SHE DOESN'T HAVE SEIZURES AND NO
20110118150627.000|20110118150632.000|CC1|INFECTIONS AND NO BLOOD CLOTS.  
20110118150632.000|20110118150633.000|CC1|AT THAT POINT, SHE GOES TO THE  
20110118150633.000|20110118150634.000|CC1|REHAB FACILITY AND STARTS       
20110118150634.000|20110118150634.000|CC1|THERAPY.                        
20110118150634.000|20110118150635.000|CC1|THE SOONER, THE BETTER.         
20110118150635.000|20110118150637.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU SEE AND HEAR ABOUT  
20110118150637.000|20110118150638.000|CC1|ALL OF THE SIGNS THAT THERE HAVE
20110118150638.000|20110118150640.000|CC1|BEEN IN TERMS OF THIS RECOVERY, 
20110118150640.000|20110118150641.000|CC1|IS IT LIKE ANYTHING YOU'VE EVER 
20110118150641.000|20110118150644.000|CC1|SEEN BEFORE?

20110118153934.000|20110118153936.000|CC1|     IF DEPRESSION IS TAKING    
20110118153936.000|20110118153936.000|CC1|       SO MUCH OUT OF YOU,      
20110118153936.000|20110118153939.000|CC1|  ASK YOUR DOCTOR ABOUT PRISTIQ.
20110118153939.000|20110118153939.000|CC1|            PRISTIQ IS          
20110118153939.000|20110118153941.000|CC1|     A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE    
20110118153941.000|20110118153943.000|CC1|   PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.  
20110118153943.000|20110118153944.000|CC1|    PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK  
20110118153944.000|20110118153944.000|CC1|    BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS OF  
20110118153944.000|20110118153946.000|CC1|  TWO CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN -- 
20110118153946.000|20110118153948.000|CC1|  SEROTONIN AND NOREPINEPHRINE. 
20110118153948.000|20110118153948.000|CC1|   TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY  
20110118153948.000|20110118153950.000|CC1|   IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS   
20110118153950.000|20110118153950.000|CC1|   OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES  
20110118153950.000|20110118153952.000|CC1|        IN MOOD, BEHAVIOR,      
20110118153952.000|20110118153953.000|CC1|     OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.    
20110118153953.000|20110118153953.000|CC1|  ANTI-DEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE 
20110118153953.000|20110118153956.000|CC1|        SUICIDAL THOUGHTS       
20110118153956.000|20110118153956.000|CC1|    AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,  
20110118153956.000|20110118153958.000|CC1|     TEENS, AND YOUNG ADULTS.   
20110118153958.000|20110118153958.000|CC1|     PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED    
20110118153958.000|20110118154000.000|CC1|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.     
20110118154000.000|20110118154003.000|CC1| DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20110118154003.000|20110118154003.000|CC1|          TAKING PRISTIQ        
20110118154003.000|20110118154005.000|CC1|    WITH NSET PAIN RELIEVERS,   
20110118154005.000|20110118154005.000|CC1|   ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS   
20110118154005.000|20110118154008.000|CC1|   MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.  
20110118154008.000|20110118154008.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110118154008.000|20110118154010.000|CC1|   ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,  
20110118154010.000|20110118154011.000|CC1|  INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE, 
20110118154011.000|20110118154011.000|CC1|      TO AVOID A POTENTIALLY    
20110118154011.000|20110118154014.000|CC1|   LIFE THREATENING CONDITION.  
20110118154014.000|20110118154014.000|CC1|   PRISTIQ MAY CAUSE OR WORSEN  
20110118154014.000|20110118154016.000|CC1|       HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE,     
20110118154016.000|20110118154017.000|CC1|  HIGH CHOLESTEROL, OR GLAUCOMA.
20110118154017.000|20110118154017.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR
